about_the_game:
A Strange Invasion

The enchanted land known as TriDevyatochkino, along with its famous Baba Yaga’s shop, has been invaded by strange creatures. Ivan Tsarevich, who was peacefully strolling through the forest, suddenly finds himself embroiled in these events...

Up to 8 Weapons and Magical Gear

Wield up to 8 weapons simultaneously, each with unique animations.

Shop for items: Horseradish tincture that enhances regeneration, a wizard's doll that increases critical hit chance, and dozens of other artifacts will help you build your ideal loadout and withstand the onslaught of enemy hordes!

They'll attack, pursue, and shoot relentlessly, leaving no room for relaxation.

Food and Wood

Even in a fairy-tale world, resources are essential. Collect apples to avoid starvation and gather wood to improve the shop, its merchandise, and more.

Heroes and Atmosphere

The game features both classic fairy-tale characters and their alternative versions, such as Kot Bayun from a dark alley or Red Riding Hood hailing from the USSR.

Fairy-tale characters familiar since childhood appear in a new setting. Armed with frying pans and axes, they’ll rewrite an old tale.

Birchbark Comic

To understand certain mechanics and uncover what happened in TriDevyatochkino, don't miss out on the comic pages that will gradually appear as you progress through the waves.

short_description: World of Slavic Glasses – a bullet-hell action game set in the world of Slavic folklore. You will fly on a stupa, fight hordes of undead creatures, and shop at Baba Yaga's store, which can surprise you as you upgrade it! Build your perfect character and try to survive all 20 waves!
